title: Trump-Ukraine Lexicon, Muni Outlook, Peloton CEO on Trading Debut, ‘The Day After Brexit’
itunes:title: Trump-Ukraine Lexicon, Muni Outlook, Peloton CEO on Trading Debut, ‘The Day After Brexit’
description:
Bloomberg News Political Reporter Ryan Teague Beckwith breaks down the language of the Trump-Ukraine scandal. Charles Doraine, CEO of Doraine Wealth Management, discusses investing in municipal bonds and why he likes the 10 year. Peleton CEO John Foley talks about the company’s first day of trading today on Nasdaq, as the stock opened at $27, below the $29 IPO price. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Brexit Reporter Joe Mayes discuss Business week Magazine’s “fictional reporting” of what the first 24 hours of a no-deal Brexit might look like. And we Drive to the Close with Michael Sheldon, Chief Investment Officer at RDM Financial Group.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
